        smash - whether to "smash" this control (i.e. run). True to run, false to walk.

      • moveUp

        public void moveUp(boolean smash)
        Description copied from class: AnimationState
        Called when the controls indicate upward movement. This is a jump in most cases.
        Specified by:
        moveUp in class AnimationState
        Parameters:
        smash - whether to "smash" this control (i.e. run).

      • moveDown

        public void moveDown(boolean smash)
        Description copied from class: AnimationState
        Called when the controls indicate downward movement. This is either to crouch, speed up the fall, or fall through thin platforms.
        Specified by:
        moveDown in class AnimationState
        Parameters:
        smash - whether to "smash" this control (i.e. run).

      • attack

        public void attack()
        Description copied from class: AnimationState
        Performs an attack. Couple this with movement to obtain smash attacks and the like.
        Specified by:
        attack in class AnimationState

      • shield

        public void shield()
        Description copied from class: AnimationState
        Performs a "shield" (the blue orb that surrounds a character). When coupled with move left or right, it causes the player to roll.
        Specified by:
        shield in class AnimationState
